{{Wired embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=SheevaPlug |revision=(003-SP1001) |asin=B00DG7HFUM;GB; |price=99 |est_release_date=03/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=plug computer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E1108AFBG-8E-F |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SD Card slot |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Dual USB to Serial UART;FTDI;FT2232D;;1; ,,, 1.2A Low Dropout Regulator;Diodes Inc.;AP7167-CS;;1; ,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Regulator;Linear Technology;LT3407;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), Debian, OpenWrt, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=nosoup4u |oui_eth=00:50:43 }} :[http://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/t-sheevaplugs.aspx Manufacturer website]
*[http://www.plugcomputer.org/plugwiki/index.php/Main_Page On ''Plug computer'' wiki] *[[wikipedia:SheevaPlug]]
CPU is a [[Marvell]] ''Kirkwood'' ARM9E :Power consumption is 2.3 to 7 watts :RAM is DDR2 (@400MHz)
Suggested price $99 (USD)
